description: This is not the stand alone application. few other things are needed. In order to Code::Blocks work properly, you must have them installed. In Discover, search "codeblocks", you will see three results. Install install all of them. Now open Konsole and run "sudo apt install g++". Now everything is ready to work.

I am using Debian, Discover installer. I had to install this in order to get the main Code::Blocks app running. If you had a problem like this, I hope this helps.
Also, the Code::Blocks IDE is by far my favorite to work with.
